poisonresistance.name: Poison Resistance
ranks: LV1 - Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
LV2 - Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
LV3 - Prevents poison.

paralysisresistance.name: Paralysis Resistance
ranks: LV1 - Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
LV2 - Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.
LV3 - Prevents paralysis.

sleepresistance.name: Sleep Resistance
ranks: LV1 - Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
LV2 - Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.
LV3 - Prevents sleep.

stunresistance.name: Stun Resistance
ranks: LV1 - Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.
LV2 - Reduces the duration of stun by 90%.
LV3 - Prevents stun.

muckresistance.name: Muck Resistance
muckresistance.description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.
ranks: LV1 - Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

blastresistance.name: Blast Resistance
ranks: LV1 - Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
LV2 - Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.
LV3 - Prevents blastblight.

bleedingresistance.name: Bleeding Resistance
ranks: LV1 - Reduces damage while bleeding.
LV2 - Greatly reduces damage while bleeding.
LV3 - Prevents bleeding.

ironskin.name: Iron Skin
ranks: LV1 - Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 50%.
LV2 - Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 75%.
LV3 - Prevents Defense Down.

earplugs.name: Earplugs
earplugs.description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.
ranks: LV1 - Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
LV2 - Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
LV3 - Nullifies weak monster roars.
LV4 - Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
LV5 - Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

windproof.name: Windproof
ranks: LV1 - Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
LV2 - Reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
LV3 - Negates minor wind pressure.
LV4 - Negates minor wind pressure and reduces the effects of major wind pressure.
LV5 - Negates minor and major wind pressure.

tremorresistance.name: Tremor Resistance
ranks: LV1 - Nullifies minor ground tremors.
LV2 - Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
LV3 - Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

dungmaster.name: Dungmaster
dungmaster.description: Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.
ranks: LV1 - Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

effluvialexpert.name: Effluvial Expert
effluvialexpert.description: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.
ranks: LV1 - Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

heatguard.name: Heat Guard
ranks: LV1 - Nullfies heat damage.

attackboost.name: Attack Boost
attackboost.description: Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.
ranks: LV1 - Attack +3
LV2 - Attack +6
LV3 - Attack +9
LV4 - Attack +12 Affinity +5%
LV5 - Attack +15 Affinity +5%
LV6 - Attack +18 Affinity +5%
LV7 - Attack +21 Affinity +5%

defenseboost.name: Defense Boost
defenseboost.description: Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.
ranks: LV1 - Defense +5
LV2 - Defense +10

LV3 - Defense +5%
Bonus: +10

LV4 - Defense +5%
Bonus: +20
All Elemental Resistances +3

LV5 - Defense +8%
Bonus: +20
All Elemental Resistances +3

LV6 - Defense +8%
Bonus: +35
All Elemental Resistances +5

LV7 - Defense +10%
Bonus: +35
All Elemental Resistances +5

healthboost.name: Health Boost
ranks: LV1 - Health +15
LV2 - Health +30
LV3 - Health +50

recoveryup.name: Recovery Up
recoveryup.description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.
ranks: LV1 - Recovery +10%
LV2 - Recovery +20%
LV3 - Recovery +30%

recoveryspeed.name: Recovery Speed
recoveryspeed.description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).
ranks: LV1 - Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
LV2 - Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
LV3 - Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

fireresistance.name: Fire Resistance
fireresistance.description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
ranks: LV1 - Fire resistance +6
LV2 - Fire resistance +12
LV3 - Fire resistance +20 Defense +10

waterresistance.name: Water Resistance
waterresistance.description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
ranks: LV1 - Water resistance +6
LV2 - Water resistance +12
LV3 - Water resistance +20 Defense +10

iceresistance.name: Ice Resistance
iceresistance.description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
ranks: LV1 - Ice resistance +6
LV2 - Ice resistance +12
LV3 - Ice resistance +20 Defense +10

thunderresistance.name: Thunder Resistance
thunderresistance.description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
ranks: LV1 - Thunder resistance +6
LV2 - Thunder resistance +12
LV3 - Thunder resistance +20 Defense +10

dragonresistance.name: Dragon Resistance
dragonresistance.description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
ranks: LV1 - Dragon resistance +6
LV2 - Dragon resistance +12
LV3 - Dragon resistance +20 Defense +10

blightresistance.name: Blight Resistance
blightresistance.description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.
ranks: LV1 - Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
LV2 - Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.
LV3 - Nullifies all elemental blights.

fireattack.name: Fire Attack
fireattack.description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Fire attack +30
LV2 - Fire attack +60
LV3 - Fire attack +100
LV4 - Fire attack +5% Bonus: +100
LV5 - Fire attack +10% Bonus: +100
LV6 - Fire attack +20% Bonus: +100

waterattack.name: Water Attack
waterattack.description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Water attack +30
LV2 - Water attack +60
LV3 - Water attack +100
LV4 - Water attack +5% Bonus: +100
LV5 - Water attack +10% Bonus: +100
LV6 - Water attack +20% Bonus: +100

iceattack.name: Ice Attack
iceattack.description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has as maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Ice attack +30
LV2 - Ice attack +60
LV3 - Ice attack +100
LV4 - Ice attack +5% Bonus: +100
LV5 - Ice attack +10% Bonus: +100
LV6 - Ice attack +20% Bonus: +100

thunderattack.name: Thunder Attack
thunderattack.description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Thunder attack +30
LV2 - Thunder attack +60
LV3 - Thunder attack +100
LV4 - Thunder attack +5% Bonus: +100
LV5 - Thunder attack +10% Bonus: +100
LV6 - Thunder attack +20% Bonus: +100

dragonattack.name: Dragon Attack
dragonattack.description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Dragon attack +30
LV2 - Dragon attack +60
LV3 - Dragon attack +100
LV4 - Dragon attack +5% Bonus: +100
LV5 - Dragon attack +10% Bonus: +100
LV6 - Dragon attack +20% Bonus: +100

poisonattack.name: Poison Attack
poisonattack.description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Poison buildup +5% Bonus: +10
LV2 - Poison buildup +10% Bonus: +10
LV3 - Poison buildup +20% Bonus: +10
LV4 - Poison buildup +30% Bonus: +10

paralysisattack.name: Paralysis Attack
paralysisattack.description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Paralysis buildup +5% Bonus: +10
LV2 - Paralysis buildup +10% Bonus: +10
LV3 - Paralysis buildup +20% Bonus: +10
LV4 - Paralysis buildup +30% Bonus: +10

sleepattack.name: Sleep Attack
sleepattack.description: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Elemental buildup has maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Sleep buildup +5% Bonus: +10
LV2 - Sleep buildup +10% Bonus: +10
LV3 - Sleep buildup +20% Bonus: +10
LV4 - Sleep buildup +30% Bonus: +10

blastattack.name: Blast Attack
blastattack.description: Increases the rate of the blast buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
ranks: LV1 - Blast buildup +5% Bonus: +10
LV2 - Blast buildup +10% Bonus: +10
LV3 - Blast buildup +20% Bonus: +10
LV4 - Blast buildup +30% Bonus: +10

normalshots.name: Normal Shots
normalshots.description: Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.
LV2 - Greatly increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

piercingshots.name: Piercing Shots
piercingshots.description: Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.
LV2 - Greatly increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

spread/powershots.name: Spread/Power Shots
spread/powershots.description: Increases the attack power of spread ammo, power shot arrows, and Thousand Dragons.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the attack power of spread ammo, power shot arrows, and Thousand Dragons.
LV2 - Greatly increases the attack power of spread ammo, power shot arrows, and Thousand Dragons.

freeelem/ammoup.name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
freeelem/ammoup.description: Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)
ranks: LV1 - Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
LV2 - Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
LV3 - Draws out 100% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

criticaleye.name: Critical Eye
ranks: LV1 - Affinity +5%
LV2 - Affinity +10%
LV3 - Affinity +15%
LV4 - Affinity +20%
LV5 - Affinity +25%
LV6 - Affinity +30%
LV7 - Affinity +40%

criticalboost.name: Critical Boost
criticalboost.description: Increases the damage of critical hits.
ranks: LV1 - Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.
LV2 - Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 35%.
LV3 - Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 40%.

weaknessexploit.name: Weakness Exploit
weaknessexploit.description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.
ranks: LV1 - Attacks that hit weak spots have 10% increased affinity, with an extra 5% on wounded parts.
LV2 - Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity, with an extra 15% on wounded parts.
LV3 - Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity, with an extra 20% on wounded parts.

focus.name: Focus
focus.description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.
ranks: LV1 - Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.
LV2 - Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.
LV3 - Increases gauge fill rate by 20% and reduces charge times by 15%.

powerprolonger.name: Power Prolonger
powerprolonger.description: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.
ranks: LV1 - Bonus duration +10%
LV2 - Bonus duration +20%
LV3 - Bonus duration +30%

handicraft.name: Handicraft
handicraft.description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauage. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.
ranks: LV1 - Weapon sharpness +10
LV2 - Weapon sharpness +20
LV3 - Weapon sharpness +30
LV4 - Weapon sharpness +40
LV5 - Weapon sharpness +50

criticaldraw.name: Critical Draw
criticaldraw.description: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.
ranks: LV1 - Draw attack affinity +30%
LV2 - Draw attack affinity +60%
LV3 - Draw attack affinity +100%

partbreaker.name: Partbreaker
partbreaker.description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.
ranks: LV1 - Part damage +10%
LV2 - Part damage +20%
LV3 - Part damage +30%

slugger.name: Slugger
slugger.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.
ranks: LV1 - Stun power +20%
LV2 - Stun power +30%
LV3 - Stun power +40%
LV4 - Stun power +50%
LV5 - Stun power +60%

staminathief.name: Stamina Thief
staminathief.description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.
ranks: LV1 - Exhaust power +20%
LV2 - Exhaust power +30%
LV3 - Exhaust power +40%
LV4 - Exhaust power +50%
LV5 - Exhaust power +60%

mastermounter.name: Master Mounter
mastermounter.description: Makes it easier to mount monsters.
ranks: LV1 - Makes it easier to mount monsters and down mounted monsters.

airborne.name: Airborne
airborne.description: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.
ranks: LV1 - Jumping attack power +30%

latentpower.name: Latent Power
latentpower.description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.
ranks: LV1 - While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
LV2 - While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
LV3 - While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
LV4 - While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
LV5 - While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
LV6 - While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%. Triggers easier.
LV7 - While active, increases affinity by 60% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%. Triggers easier.

agitator.name: Agitator
agitator.description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.
ranks: LV1 - While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 5%.
LV2 - While active, grants attack +8 and increases affinity by 5%.
LV3 - While active, grants attack +12 and increases affinity by 7%.
LV4 - While active, grants attack +16 and increases affinity by 7%.
LV5 - While active, grants attack +20 and increases affinity by 10%.
LV6 - While active, grants Attack +24 and increases Affinity by 15%
LV7 - While active, grants Attack +28 and increases Affinity by 20%

peakperformance.name: Peak Performance
peakperformance.description: Increases attack when your health is full.
ranks: LV1 - While active, grants attack +5.
LV2 - While active, grants attack +10.
LV3 - While active, grants attack +20.

heroics.name: Heroics
heroics.description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
ranks: LV1 - While active, increases defense by 50 points
LV2 - While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 50 points.
LV3 - While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 100 points.
LV4 - While active, increases attack power by 10% and increases defense by 100 points.
LV5 - While active, increases attack power by 15% and increases defense by 100 points.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.description: Temporarily increases your attack and defense every time you faint up to 2 times.
ranks: LV1 - Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

resentment.name: Resentment
resentment.description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).
ranks: LV1 - While active, grants attack +5.
LV2 - While active, grants attack +10.
LV3 - While active, grants attack +15.
LV4 - While active, grants attack +20.
LV5 - While active, grants attack +25.

resuscitate.name: Resuscitate
resuscitate.description: Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.
ranks: LV1 - While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

hornmaestro.name: Horn Maestro
hornmaestro.description: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.
ranks: LV1 - Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.
LV2 - Greatly increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

capacityboost.name: Capacity Boost
capacityboost.description: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
ranks: LV1 - Loading capacity +1

specialammoboost.name: Special Ammo Boost
specialammoboost.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
LV2 - Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

artillery.name: Artillery
artillery.description: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.
ranks: LV1 - Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
LV2 - Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
LV3 - Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.
LV4 - Increases power of each attack by 40% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 60%.
LV5 - Increases power of each attack by 50% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 70%.

heavyartillery.name: Heavy Artillery
heavyartillery.description: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.
ranks: LV1 - Firepower +50%
LV2 - Firepower +100%

marathonrunner.name: Marathon Runner
marathonrunner.description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).
ranks: LV1 - Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 15%.
LV2 - Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 30%.
LV3 - Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 50%.

constitution.name: Constitution
constitution.description: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.
ranks: LV1 - Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 10%.
LV2 - Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 20%.
LV3 - Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 30%.
LV4 - Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 40%.
LV5 - Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 50%.

leapoffaith.name: Leap of Faith
leapoffaith.description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.
ranks: LV1 - Enables Leap of Faith.

staminasurge.name: Stamina Surge
ranks: LV1 - Stamina recovery speed +10%
LV2 - Stamina recovery speed +20%
LV3 - Stamina recovery speed +30%

hungerresistance.name: Hunger Resistance
hungerresistance.description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time. However, does not work against cold environments that reduce stamina.
ranks: LV1 - Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 50%.
LV2 - Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 100%.
LV3 - Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

evadewindow.name: Evade Window
evadewindow.description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.
ranks: LV1 - Very slightly increases invulnerability window.
LV2 - Slightly increases invulnerability window.
LV3 - Increases invulnerability window.
LV4 - Greatly increases invulnerability window.
LV5 - Massively increases invulnerability window.

evadeextender.name: Evade Extender
ranks: LV1 - Slightly extends evasion distance.
LV2 - Extends evasion distance.
LV3 - Greatly extends evasion distance.

guard.name: Guard
guard.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.
ranks: LV1 - Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
LV2 - Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
LV3 - Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 15%.
LV4 - Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 30%.
LV5 - Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 50%.

quicksheath.name: Quick Sheath
ranks: LV1 - Slightly increases sheathing speed.
LV2 - Moderately increases sheathing speed.
LV3 - Greatly increases sheathing speed.

wide-range.name: Wide-Range
wide-range.description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.
ranks: LV1 - Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
LV2 - Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
LV3 - Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
LV4 - Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
LV5 - Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with full efficacy.

itemprolonger.name: Item Prolonger
itemprolonger.description: Extends the duration of some item effects.
ranks: LV1 - Item effect duration +10%
LV2 - Item effect duration +25%
LV3 - Item effect duration +50%

freemeal.name: Free Meal
freemeal.description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.
ranks: LV1 - Activates 25% of the time.
LV2 - Activates 50% of the time.
LV3 - Activates 75% of the time.

speedeating.name: Speed Eating
ranks: LV1 - Slightly increases item use speed.
LV2 - Moderately increases item use speed.
LV3 - Greatly increases item use speed.

speedsharpening.name: Speed Sharpening
speedsharpening.description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.
ranks: LV1 - Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
LV2 - Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
LV3 - Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

bombardier.name: Bombardier
bombardier.description: Increases the damage of explosive items.
ranks: LV1 - Explosive power +10%
LV2 - Explosive power +20%
LV3 - Explosive power +30%
LV4 - Explosive power +40%
LV5 - Explosive power +50%

mushroomancer.name: Mushroomancer
mushroomancer.description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.
ranks: LV1 - Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
LV2 - Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
LV3 - Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

masterfisher.name: Master Fisher
ranks: LV1 - Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

protransporter.name: Pro Transporter
protransporter.description: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.
ranks: LV1 - Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

mastergatherer.name: Master Gatherer
mastergatherer.description: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.
ranks: LV1 - Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

honeyhunter.name: Honey Hunter
honeyhunter.description: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.
ranks: LV1 - One extra honey per gather.

carvingpro.name: Carving Pro
carvingpro.description: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.
ranks: LV1 - Prevents knockback while carving.

divineblessing.name: Divine Blessing
divineblessing.description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.
ranks: LV1 - While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
LV2 - While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
LV3 - While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.
LV4 - While active, reduces damage taken by 60%.
LV5 - While active, reduces damage taken by 60%. Skill becomes easier to activate as well.

palicorally.name: Palico Rally
ranks: LV1 - Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
LV2 - Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
LV3 - Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
LV4 - Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
LV5 - Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

botanist.name: Botanist
botanist.description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.
ranks: LV1 - One extra consumable herb item per gather.
LV2 - One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
LV3 - One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
LV4 - One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect or mushroom item per gather.

geologist.name: Geologist
geologist.description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.
ranks: LV1 - Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
LV2 - Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.
LV3 - Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.

maximummight.name: Maximum Might
maximummight.description: Increases affinity as long as stamina is kept full for a period of time.
ranks: LV1 - While active, increases affinity by 10%.
LV2 - While active, increases affinity by 20%.
LV3 - While active, increases affinity by 30%.
LV4 - While active, increases affinity by 40%.
LV5 - Increases affinity by 40% as soon as the stamina gauge is full.

slingercapacity.name: Slinger Capacity
slingercapacity.description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
LV2 - In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
LV3 - In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
LV4 - Increases the loading capacity for the slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants even more
LV5 - Increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
ranks: LV1 - Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
LV2 - Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
LV3 - Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

flinchfree.name: Flinch Free
flinchfree.description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.
ranks: LV1 - Prevents knockbacks.
LV2 - Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback. Increases some Kinsect extract effects.
LV3 - Prevents knockbacks and tripping. Increases some Kinsect extract effects.

scoutflyrangeup.name: Scoutfly Range Up
ranks: LV1 - Expands your scoutflies' detection range.

speedcrawler.name: Speed Crawler
ranks: LV1 - Increases movement speed while crouching.

jumpmaster.name: Jump Master
jumpmaster.description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.
ranks: LV1 - Negates knockback during jumps.

survivalexpert.name: Survival Expert
survivalexpert.description: Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables like Sporepuffs or Wiggly Litchi.
ranks: LV1 - Interactables restore an additional 50 health.
LV2 - Interactables restore an additional 80 health.
LV3 - Interactables restore an additional 100 health.

aquatic/polarmobility.name: Aquatic/Polar Mobility
aquatic/polarmobility.description: Lets you move more freely in water. Also prevents you from being slowed down by terrain effects, such as deep snow.
ranks: LV1 - Prevents lowered movement speed.
LV2 - Increases your evade window and prevents lowered movement speed.
LV3 - Greatly increases your evade window and prevents lowered movement speed.

cliffhanger.name: Cliffhanger
cliffhanger.description: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy, or when moving while grappling onto an enemy.
ranks: LV1 - Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 50%.

blindsider.name: Blindsider
blindsider.description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the success rate of flash effects.

scholar.name: Scholar
scholar.description: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)
ranks: LV1 - Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

entomologist.name: Entomologist
entomologist.description: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
LV2 - Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
LV3 - Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

effluviaresistance.name: Effluvia Resistance
effluviaresistance.description: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.
ranks: LV1 - Reduces effluvial buildup.
LV2 - Greatly reduces effluvial buildup.
LV3 - Prevents effluvial buildup.

scenthound.name: Scenthound
scenthound.description: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.
ranks: LV1 - Increases gauge fill rate by 50%.

forager'sluck.name: Forager's Luck
forager'sluck.description: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

detector.name: Detector
detector.description: Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.
ranks: LV1 - Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

bbqmaster.name: BBQ Master
bbqmaster.description: Improves your skill at cooking meat.
ranks: LV1 - Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

toolspecialist.name: Tool Specialist
toolspecialist.description: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.
ranks: LV1 - Shortens time until reuse by 10%.
LV2 - Shortens time until reuse by 20%.
LV3 - Shortens time until reuse by 30%.
LV4 - Shortens time until reuse by 40%.
LV5 - Shortens time until reuse by 50%.

affinitysliding.name: Affinity Sliding
affinitysliding.description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.
ranks: LV1 - +30% Affinity for 15 seconds after sliding.

intimidator.name: Intimidator
intimidator.description: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)
ranks: LV1 - Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
LV2 - Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
LV3 - Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

hastenrecovery.name: Hasten Recovery
hastenrecovery.description: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.
ranks: LV1 - Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

superrecovery.name: Super Recovery
superrecovery.description: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.
ranks: LV1 - Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

poisondurationup.name: Poison Duration Up
poisondurationup.description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.
ranks: LV1 - Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.
ranks: LV1 - Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

staminacapup.name: Stamina Cap Up
ranks: LV1 - Increases stamina cap.

criticalelement.name: Critical Element
criticalelement.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
ranks: LV1 - Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

mind'seye/ballistics.name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
mind'seye/ballistics.description: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.
ranks: LV1 - Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

bludgeoner.name: Bludgeoner
bludgeoner.description: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.
ranks: LV1 - Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

non-elementalboost.name: Non-elemental Boost
non-elementalboost.description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.
ranks: LV1 - Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

capturemaster.name: Capture Master
capturemaster.description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
ranks: LV1 - High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

guardup.name: Guard Up
guardup.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.
ranks: LV1 - Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).
ranks: LV1 - Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).

master'stouch.name: Master's Touch
master'stouch.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.
ranks: LV1 - Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

nullifywindpressure.name: Nullify Wind Pressure
ranks: LV1 - Negates all wind pressure.

razorsharp/spareshot.name: Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
razorsharp/spareshot.description: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.
ranks: LV1 - Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

criticalstatus.name: Critical Status
criticalstatus.description: Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.
ranks: LV1 - Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

goodluck.name: Good Luck
goodluck.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
ranks: LV1 - Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

bowchargeplus.name: Bow Charge Plus
bowchargeplus.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.
ranks: LV1 - Increases max bow charge level by one.

punishingdraw.name: Punishing Draw
punishingdraw.description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.
ranks: LV1 - Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.

protectivepolish.name: Protective Polish
protectivepolish.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.
ranks: LV1 - Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

poisonfunctionality.name: Poison Functionality
poisonfunctionality.description: Allows you to apply poison coatings.
ranks: LV1 - Lets you use poison coating.

parafunctionality.name: Para Functionality
parafunctionality.description: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.
ranks: LV1 - Lets you use paralysis coating.

sleepfunctionality.name: Sleep Functionality
sleepfunctionality.description: Allows you to apply sleep coatings.
ranks: LV1 - Lets you use sleep coating.

blastfunctionality.name: Blast Functionality
blastfunctionality.description: Allows you to apply blast coatings.
ranks: LV1 - Lets you use blast coating.

eldersealboost.name: Elderseal Boost
eldersealboost.description: Increases the Elderseal of weapons and dragon ammo.
ranks: LV1 - Boosts Elderseal one level.

greatluck.name: Great Luck
greatluck.description: High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
ranks: LV1 - High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

carvingmaster.name: Carving Master
carvingmaster.description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
ranks: LV1 - Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

elementalairborne.name: Elemental Airborne
elementalairborne.description: Elemental damage increased for jumping attacks.
ranks: LV1 - Elemental damage increased for jumping attacks.

igniintensity.name: Igni Intensity
igniintensity.description: Only those who complete the rigorous witcher training are allowed to use the powerful magic of the Igni Sign.
ranks: LV1 - Only those who complete the rigorous witcher training are allowed to use the powerful magic of the Igni Sign.

offensiveguard.name: Offensive Guard
offensiveguard.description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.
ranks: LV1 - While active, increases attack power by 5%.
LV2 - While active, increases attack power by 10%.
LV3 - While active, increases attack power by 15%.

bombardiersecret.name: Bombardier Secret
bombardiersecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Bombardier skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Bombardier skill.

slingercapacitysecret.name: Slinger Capacity Secret
slingercapacitysecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Slinger Capacity skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Slinger Capacity skill.

truecriticalelement.name: True Critical Element
truecriticalelement.description: Greatly increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
ranks: LV1 - Greatly increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

divineblessingsecret.name: Divine Blessing Secret
divineblessingsecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Divine Blessing skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Divine Blessing skill.

truecriticalstatus.name: True Critical Status
truecriticalstatus.description: Greatly increases status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.
ranks: LV1 - Greatly increases status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

latentpowersecret.name: Latent Power Secret
latentpowersecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Latent Power skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Latent Power skill.

artillerysecret.name: Artillery Secret
artillerysecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Artillery skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Artillery skill.

coalescence.name: Coalescence
coalescence.description: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal status.
ranks: LV1 - While active, grants attack +12, element attack power +30, and status buildup + 5%.
LV2 - While active, grants attack +15, element attack power +60, and status buildup + 10%.
LV3 - While active, grants attack +18, element attack power +90, and status buildup + 15%.

gaia'sveil.name: Gaia's Veil
gaia'sveil.description: While wearing a mantle, gain Windproof Lv3, Earplugs Lv3, Tremor Res Lv3, and Flinch Free.
ranks: LV1 - While wearing a mantle, gain Windproof Lv3, Earplugs Lv3, Tremor Res Lv3, and Flinch Free.

truegaia'sveil.name: True Gaia's Veil
truegaia'sveil.description: While wearing a mantle, gain Tremor Resistance Lv3, Earplugs Lv5, max Windproof, and Flinch Free.
ranks: LV1 - While wearing a mantle, gain Tremor Resistance Lv3, Earplugs Lv5, max Windproof, and Flinch Free.

elementacceleration.name: Element Acceleration
elementacceleration.description: Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv2 and increases elemental damage.
ranks: LV1 - Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv2 and increases elemental damage.

trueelementacceleration.name: True Element Acceleration
trueelementacceleration.description: Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv3 and increases elemental damage.
ranks: LV1 - Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv3 and increases elemental damage.

frostcraft.name: Frostcraft
frostcraft.description: An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. Wanes each melee hit or shot fired.
ranks: LV1 - An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. Wanes each melee hit or shot fired.

staminathiefsecret.name: Stamina Thief Secret
staminathiefsecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Stamina Thief skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Stamina Thief skill.

freemealsecret.name: Free Meal Secret
freemealsecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Free Meal skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Free Meal skill.

agitatorsecret.name: Agitator Secret
agitatorsecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Agitator skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Agitator skill.

sluggersecret.name: Slugger Secret
sluggersecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Slugger skill to 5.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Slugger skill to 5.

truerazorsharp/spareshot.name: True Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
truerazorsharp/spareshot.description: Greatly reduces sharpness loss. Bows and bowguns have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.
ranks: LV1 - Greatly reduces sharpness loss. Bows and bowguns have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

maximummightsecret.name: Maximum Might Secret
maximummightsecret.description: Raises  the maximum level of the Maximum Might skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises  the maximum level of the Maximum Might skill.

toolspecialistsecret.name: Tool Specialist Secret
toolspecialistsecret.description: Raises the maximum level of the Tool Specialist skill.
ranks: LV1 - Raises the maximum level of the Tool Specialist skill.

zombie&effluviares.name: Zombie & Effluvia Res
ranks: LV1 - Prevents zombie and effluvial buildup.

provoker.name: Provoker
provoker.description: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.
ranks: LV1 - Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.

safelanding.name: Safe Landing
safelanding.description: Allows you to quickly recover from heavy attacks that blow you back when you have your weapon unsheathed.
ranks: LV1 - Allows you to quickly recover from heavy attacks that blow you back when you have your weapon unsheathed.

coldproof.name: Coldproof
coldproof.description: Nullifies the effects of cold weather.
ranks: LV1 - Activates skill effect.

dragonveinawakening.name: Dragonvein Awakening
dragonveinawakening.description: Elem., abnormal status, & affinity up with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.
ranks: LV1 - Elem., abnormal status, & affinity up with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.

truedragonveinawakening.name: True Dragonvein Awakening
truedragonveinawakening.description: Enhances attacks even more with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.
ranks: LV1 - Enhances attacks even more with weapon drawn. Take damage when attacking, but can be recovered by continually attacking.
